name: Olga Kapitskaya
summary: Olga Kapitskaya has over two decades of experience in the financial industry, specializing in wealth advisory, institutional equity research, and private equity. She is passionate about helping clients, particularly women who run private businesses, medical doctors, company executives, and retirees, establish and adjust their wealth management strategies.
work_history: RBC Wealth Management, Financial Advisor, April 2022 - Present: Currently serving as a Financial Advisor in Los Angeles. Merrill Lynch Wealth Management, Financial Advisor, September 2011 - April 2022: Served as a Financial Advisor for over a decade. Pepperdine University, Adjunct Faculty, March 2010 - September 2020: Taught as an Adjunct Faculty member. Morgan Stanley Smith Barney, Financial Advisor, August 2010 - August 2011: Worked as a Financial Advisor for a year. BetaOne Consulting, Principle, September 2001 - August 2010: Held the position of Principle. Alfred Mann Foundation, Analyst, October 2008 - January 2009: Worked as an Analyst for a few months. Stifel, Nicolaus & Co, Equity Research Analyst, April 1998 - October 2008: Served as an Equity Research Analyst for over a decade. Rodman & Renshaw, Inc., Equity Research Analyst, April 1996 - March 1998: Started her career as an Equity Research Analyst.
project_history: Focused on wealth management strategies for diverse client groups including private business owners, medical professionals, executives, and retirees.
skills: Wealth advisory, institutional equity research, private equity, financial strategy development, client relationship management.
education: Pepperdine University, Master's Degree in Business/Finance, 2003 - 2006. Long Island University, Bachelor's Degree, 1992 - 1994.

Olga Kapitskaya, CRPC®
Associate Vice President – Financial Advisor at RBC Wealth
Management
Beverly Hills, California, United States
Summary
I have been working in the financial industry since 1995 and joined
RBC Wealth Management in April of 2022 following more than a
decade of professional experience as a financial advisor at Merrill
Lynch Bank of America. My professional background includes wealth
advisory, institutional equity research, and private equity roles at
other leading wealth management firms in New York City and Los
Angeles. 
One of the reasons I chose a career in the financial services
industry, is my desire to help others. This passion stems from
witnessing the challenges faced by people in my life and I
recognized the need for a caring professional to help others define
their goals, establish a wealth management strategy centered
on their priorities, and help them adjust their strategy as needed
when the inevitable changes in life happen.  As a financial advisor I
focus on working with women who run private businesses, medical
doctors, company executives, and retirees.
Outside of the office, I enjoy traveling with my family, reading about
medieval history, and cooking, because it’s part science and part
magic. 
Please visit http://www.rbcwealthmanagement.com/us/en/legal for
important disclosure information. Investment and insurance products
offered through RBC Wealth Management are not insured by the
FDIC or any other federal government agency, are not deposits or
other obligations of, or guaranteed by, a bank or any bank affiliate,
and are subject to investment risks, including possible loss of the
principal amount invested. RBC Wealth Management, a division of
RBC Capital Markets, LLC, Member NYSE/FINRA/SIPC.
